      • collectKey

        public boolean collectKey(int id)
        Customer's method. The customer waits for a replacement car's key and goes get one if it is available. Eventually, if the customer's car is repaired while waiting, he goes to the normal queue.
        Specified by:
        collectKey in interface ICustomerL
        Parameters:
        id - id of the customer
        Returns:
        true if car was repaired while customer waited for replacement car

      • alertCustomer

        public boolean alertCustomer(int id)
        Manager's method. Manager checks if the customer is in outside world or in lounge and then calls customer and tells him that his car is ready to be picked up.
        Specified by:
        alertCustomer in interface IManagerL
        Parameters:
        id - customer's id to call
        Returns:
        a boolean that returns true if customer is in lounge and false if he's in outside world
